name: International Online Conference on Functional Nanomaterials
content: This conference aims to bring together leading scientists, researchers, and students with interests in nanotechnology to exchange information on their latest research progress and innovation. The online conference will consist of two themed symposia (one each day), followed by an extended discussion of ePosters. 1\. Symposium on Synthesis and –êpplication of Nanoparticles: - Synthesis of inorganic nanomaterials; - Electrodeposition of thin films; - Polymeric nanomaterials; - New technology trends and applications; 2\. Symposium on Photo/Catalysis - Photocatalyst modification (e.g. by noble metal, C nanotubes, graphene, molecular clusters, novel materials etc..) and doping; - New reactions, characterizations of catalysts;
